Pre-Game Insights: Both franchises have the same record of 75-58.
The batting average of the Royals is.258, with a total of 643 runs scored.
The on-base and slugging percentages have been.314 and.424, respectively.
The Cleveland Guardians have a batting average of.237 and have scored only 600 runs.

The betting odds lean slightly towards the Guardians as the favorites at home.
